name: Satarchy Software Solution (P) Ltd.
tag_list: outsourcing, software, web-development, software-development, web-application-development, clientserver-application-development, crm-consulting, data-processing
overview:
IT services provider

Satarchy Software Solutions (P) Ltd. is an Indian software company with the corporate objective of being a global IT services provider, having progressive business practices and ethical value systems. customers can look up to it as the single point to meet all their IT service needs. From taking up and delivering large turnkey projects from its development facilities in India, to providing on-site consulting and development resources worldwide, we would customize our services to meet your specific requirement.

Satarchy also offer the unique and innovative, technology-intensive, Dedicated Offshore Center to its customers, which functions like an extension of their facilities in their country.

Satarchy offers a balanced mix of on-site and offshore project implementation approaches based on the need for speed, resource requirements, and coordination with related teams, customer preference and cost-effective development.
